parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Time range for incident created and indicator import.

parameters.name: Category
parameters.label: Threat Actor Category
parameters.query:
RecordedFutureThreatMap_CL
| distinct categories_s
| mv-expand parse_json(categories_s)
| distinct id = tostring(categories_s.id), name = tostring(categories_s.name)

parameters.name: Watchlist
parameters.label: Recorded Future Watchlist
parameters.query:
RecordedFutureThreatMap_CL
| distinct log_entries_s
| mv-expand parse_json(log_entries_s)
| where isnotempty(log_entries_s.watchlist)
| distinct id = tostring(log_entries_s.watchlist.id), name = tostring(log_entries_s.watchlist.name)

content.json:
Threat Actor Map

This workbook shows Threat Actors imported from [Recorded Future](https://app.recordedfuture.com/portal/threat), their intent towards your company, and their opportunity. Intent (y-axis) - The threat actor has presented previous interest (expressed or manifested) against elements that are relevant to an organization (e.g., industry, peers, third parties, executives, brand, internet-facing assets). Opportunity (x-axis) - A correlation between the threat actor's capabilities and an organizationâ€™s vulnerabilities. The capability is a threat actor's ability to perform certain activities or cyber attacks, (i.e., their "sophistication"); vulnerabilities include an organization's exposures, gaps, or technology-related vulnerabilities. Data is fetched from Recorded Future thru the playbook ```RecordedFuture-ThreatMap-lmporter```.

content.query:
RecordedFutureThreatMap_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where categories_s has_any('{Category}') 
| where log_entries_s has_any('{Watchlist}') 
| extend combine= intent_d+opportunity_d
| project TimeGenerated, id_s, name_s, intent_d, opportunity_d,  combine
| summarize MaxTimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated) by id_s, name_s, intent_d, opportunity_d, combine
| order by combine desc 
| project MaxTimeGenerated, id_s, name_s, intent_d, opportunity_d
| take 100
content.title: Threat Actor Map

content.query:
RecordedFutureThreatMap_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where categories_s has_any('{Category}') 
| where log_entries_s has_any('{Watchlist}') 
| extend combine= intent_d+opportunity_d
| project TimeGenerated, id_s, name_s, intent_d, opportunity_d, combine
| summarize MaxTimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated) by id_s, name_s, intent_d, opportunity_d,combine
| order by combine desc 
| project Name=name_s, Intent=intent_d, Opportunity=opportunity_d, id_s
content.title: Threat Actors

content.query:
RecordedFutureThreatMap_CL
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange:query}
| where id_s == "{ThreatActor}"
| take 1
| mv-expand categoriesArray= parse_json(categories_s)
| mv-expand watchlistArray = parse_json(log_entries_s)
| summarize  ["Threat Actor Categories"] = make_list(categoriesArray.name), WatchLists= make_list_with_nulls(watchlistArray.watchlist.name) by Link=strcat("https://app.recordedfuture.com/live/sc/entity/",id_s), Name=name_s, Id=id_s,  Aliases=array_strcat(parse_json(alias_s),',')
content.title: Actor Details
content.noDataMessage: Please select a threat actor in the Threat Actors table to display details.

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where ExpirationDateTime > now()
| where Description contains("{ThreatActor}")
| summarize Indicators=count(Description) by  Description
content.title: Active Indicators for Hunting

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Title contains "{ThreatActor}"
| summarize CreateTime = max(CreatedTime) by IncidentUrl, Title,Description
content.title: Incidents created

content.json:
To generate incidents using imported indicators. Create analytic rules that  correlates data from infrastructure logs with recorded future hunting indicators. Install and modify the provided analytic rule templates to match your environent. 
```
Recorded Future - Threat Hunting - Domain - All Actors
Recorded Future - Threat Hunting - IP - All Actors
Recorded Future - Threat Hunting - Hash - All Actors
Recorded Future - Threat Hunting - Url - All Actors
```
Install and configure Recorded Future Incident Enrichment Playbook to get additional information when incidents are created ```RecordedFuture-IOC_Enrichment-IP_Domain_URL_Hash```
